p: For neurologically diseased horses, three horses with CVCM received ASCs labeled with noninfectious viral vectors transduced with green fluorescent protein (GFP) via AO injection. Blood and CSF were collected prior to and 7 ( n = 1) or 15 ( n = 2) days after ASC injection. Additionally, neurological examinations were performed until the end of the study (7 or 15 days). Horses were euthanized at 7 or 15 days postinjection and submitted for a full nervous system necropsy by a board-certified veterinary pathologist.
